title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Knowledge Graphs for AI and Intelligent Systems (DAT209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向AI和智能系统的知识图谱 (DAT209)
abstract: Enterprise-grade AI needs a unified data strategy for accurate, reliable results. Learn how knowledge graphs bridge the gap between how the real world operates and how companies actually store and organize data - transforming data into knowledge. See how Agentic GraphRAG (retrieval-augmented generation with knowledge graphs) drives real success: Learn how Neo4j customers have deployed GenAI to build chatbots grounded in knowledge graphs, improving productivity and trust, while a major gaming company achieved 10x faster insights. We’ll share real examples and practical steps for successful GenAI deployment. This presentation is brought to you by Neo4j, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 企业级AI需要统一的数据策略来获得准确、可靠的结果。了解知识图谱如何弥合现实世界运作方式与企业实际存储和组织数据方式之间的差距——将数据转化为知识。了解代理式GraphRAG（基于知识图谱的检索增强生成）如何推动真正的成功：学习Neo4j客户如何部署GenAI构建基于知识图谱的聊天机器人，提高生产力和信任度，同时一家大型游戏公司实现了10倍更快的洞察。我们将分享成功部署GenAI的真实案例和实用步骤。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Neo4j提供。
